Title: Relates to employment of retired first responders who participated in the World Trade Center rescue and recovery operations without diminution of retirement allowance
Summary: Permits reemployment of retired first responders who participated in the World Trade Center rescue and recovery operations without diminution of retirement allowance.
LawCode: Amd ยง212, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to employment of retired first responders who participated in the World Trade center rescue and recovery operations without diminution of retirement allowance
